item.title: CVE-2022-27174|2024-08-03T05:25:31.006Z -- coremobile%20co.%20ltd. -- easy%20blog%20for%20ec-cube4
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Easy Blog for EC-CUBE4 Ver.1.0.1 and earlier allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to hijack the authentication of the administrator and delete a blog article or a category via a specially crafted page.
